title: Spiced grilled salmon with sweetcorn relish
ingredients: ['1/4 tsp plus 2 tbsp sugar', '1 tsp ground coriander', '1/2 tsp salt', '1/2 tsp ground cinnamon', '1/4 tsp crushed cardamom seeds', '1/4 tsp freshly ground black pepper', '4 salmon steaks, about 150g each', '1/2 tsp yellow mustard seeds', '75ml white wine vinegar', '1 courgette, diced', '1 orange or red pepper, seeded and diced', '175g sweetcorn, canned or thawed if bought frozen']
